task.title: How to pay for this trip
task.shortdesc: Good things in life cost money. This is one of those good things.

step.cmd: Look at your bank account well before we go to Chicago.
Try to save about $200 to $300 before the trip so you can feel free to buy things.
Remember that your suitcase is stuffed as it is, so you won't need to be buying any clothes.
The majority of what you're buying is food, so plan for leaving tips.
